article:
A story tells that two friends were walking through the desert( ). During the trip they had a 36 _ , and one friend hit the other in the face. The one who was beaten was hurt, but without saying 37 _ , he wrote in the sand: " Today my best friend hit me in the face."
   They 38 _  on walking until they found a lake, where they decided to take a bath . The one, who had been beaten, fell into the lake and started drowning , but the friend saved him. After he came back to life from the near drowning, he wrote on a 39 _ : " Today my best friend saved my life."
   The friend who had hit and 40 _  his best friend asked: "41 _ I hurt you, you wrote in the sand and now, you wrote on a stone, why?" The other friend42 _  : " When someone hurts us, we should write it down in sand 43 _   wind can blow it away. 44 _ , when someone does something good for us, we must write it down in stone where no 45 _  can ever blow it away."
